Kup:

"Yup, We dont like to have another loss, my friend"said Kup"And perce=
ptor can be blind but he isnt fool, I hate to admit it but he's a geniuos  =
when he is involved in hi-tech stuff. He reprogramed Nightlight once and wh=
en we tried to reprogram her  back to her Maximal status we almost loss her=
..."Kupp looked to a sleepy elita and added"We may need a copy of their rep=
rograming programs and Before attemp to rescue them we will need to know ho=
w bring them back; we also have to locate windlord, and know what had happe=
ned to him, he is most likely alive and reprogramed... You may need a copy =
of his signature"

Kup sighted "Till situation calm down Nightshift, you sh=
ould be carefull and not made them suspect about you. I guess that we have =
to create a conflict  in order Hydras see you shooting us and if that help =
you to gain his trust, I'm volunteer to be hit... but  it must be a real on=
e, even if that mean several days in the CR." and looking to Tucson, he sai=
d "One question Tucson, before we start this mission: did you be able to ge=
t contact to Nightlight?"


From: Preston Carroll 
Sent: Wednesday, March 1=
7, 2010 2:52 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Subject: Re: Back to the Ark


=
  
> Night Shift points a playful finger at Tucson with a sly grin."
>
> "S=
lag boy, you are one sneaky bot. Exactly what I had in mind but that little=
 ditty at the end, didn't see that one commn'. You got it, next stop... Hyd=
ra's place right?"
>
> Tucson nodds. Night Shift looks to everyone.
>
> " Y=
o, you guys okay with that right?"

Lord Elder turned to look at Nightshift=
, his optics thoughtful and
curious. "I have read reports about you Nightsh=
ift, but I see they did
not do you or Tuscon Justice." he said as he stood =
up.

As Tuscon and Nightshift laid out their plan, his optics followed
them=
, flipping from one bot to the other as they bounced off of each
other.

"I=
nteresting." he said as he folded his arms over his chest, rubbing
his chin=
 speculatively. "Hydras is no fool" he said slowly, his
thoughts obviously =
churning. "and he is not usually the trusting sort.
I can imagine with the =
last little break in, he will probably be less
so."

Lord Elder frowned tho=
ughtfully, "It might work though, but you are
going to have to be very care=
ful. We don't want another missing
comrade."

(TAG)

Preston

OOC: Sandy, I=
 sent out a new note to ya. If you don't see, maybe it
fell into your spam =
stuff?? Yahoo can be bad about taking mail and
thinking its spam sometimes =
:)
